source: YouTube Community Guidelines, FCC Guidelines, MPAA Rating System

Kids (G).description: Content suitable for all ages, including young children. Must be appropriate for unsupervised viewing by minors.
prohibited: Any form of violence, including cartoon violence with harmful intent
Any profanity, crude language, or offensive terminology
Alcohol, tobacco, vaping, or drug references/imagery
Weapons or firearms (including toys that look realistic)
Dangerous activities that could be imitated
restricted: Mild conflict between characters (must be resolved positively)
Fantasy elements that may confuse young children
requirements: Educational or entertainment value for children

Teens (PG-13).description: Content suitable for teenagers 13+. May contain moderate mature themes but nothing explicit.
prohibited: Explicit violence with gore, blood, or graphic injuries
Strong profanity (F-word, sexual slurs, hate speech)
Drug use or drug paraphernalia shown in positive light
Graphic depictions of death or torture
Self-harm or suicide depicted in detail
Hard drug references (heroin, cocaine, meth, etc.)
restricted: Mild profanity (damn, hell, ass) - should be infrequent
References to marijuana in educational/news context
requirements: Negative behaviors should not be glorified

Adult (R).description: Content for viewers 18+. May contain mature themes but must comply with platform policies.
restricted: Strong profanity - allowed but not excessive
Violence in fictional contexts - allowed with age gate
Alcohol and tobacco use - allowed, not promoted
Drug references - allowed in educational/artistic context
Horror and disturbing imagery - allowed with warning
requirements: No monetization on extremely sensitive topics

violence.description: Physical harm, fighting, weapons, or threatening behavior

severity_levels.mild: Cartoon violence, slapstick, minor physical comedy
severity_levels.moderate: Action violence, fighting without gore, weapon display
severity_levels.severe: Graphic violence, blood, gore, realistic harm

profanity.description: Offensive language, swearing, slurs, or crude expressions

severity_levels.severe: F-word, C-word, sexual slurs, racial slurs, hate speech

alcohol.description: Alcoholic beverages, drinking, bars, or alcohol brands

tobacco.description: Cigarettes, cigars, vaping, or tobacco products

drugs.description: Illegal drugs, prescription drug abuse, or drug paraphernalia

severity_levels.mild: Reference to drugs in educational context

sexual_content.description: Romantic content, suggestive behavior, or nudity

severity_levels.moderate: Extended kissing, suggestive clothing, implied intimacy

gambling.description: Betting, casinos, lotteries, or gambling promotion

platform_specific_rules: Made for Kids content is subject to COPPA regulations
Ads on kids content are limited by FTC guidelines
Age-restricted content cannot be monetized with all advertisers
Repeated violations may result in channel termination
Community Guidelines strikes affect channel standing
